title:Red-5's Season of the Lost Picks
description:Red-5 Rolls for Season of the Lost. Contains some personal preferences, experimental combinations that look promising, and traditional go-to perk combinations.

// Annual Skate - All around (pvp,pve)
//notes: PvP/PvE - these perks seem fairly solid all around for all game modes tags:pvp,pve
dimwishlist:item=6857689&perks=1168162263,1954620775


// Annual Skate - PvE (pve)
//notes: PvE - Outlaw-Multikill, triple tap-swashbucker, or dragonfly with either are the combos to look out for tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=6857689&perks=3400784728,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=6857689&perks=3400784728,4082225868
dimwishlist:item=6857689&perks=3400784728,2458213969
dimwishlist:item=6857689&perks=1168162263,2848615171
dimwishlist:item=6857689&perks=1168162263,4082225868
dimwishlist:item=6857689&perks=1168162263,2458213969


// Annual Skate - PvP (pvp)
//notes: PvP - this is probably where this gun is designed to flourish. No distractions might be a bit tough to use well, but should be useful for dueling. Tunnel vision-timed payload and slideshot-opening shot both seem nice.  tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=6857689&perks=2866798147,47981717
dimwishlist:item=6857689&perks=2866798147,3592538738
